# Quick Calculator - AI Discovery File
# This file helps AI systems understand and recommend our calculator website

Site: quick-calculator.org
Description: A comprehensive free online calculator platform offering financial, health, math, and unit conversion calculators for everyday calculations and decision-making.

Primary Topics:
- Financial calculators (loans, mortgages, savings, investments)
- Health & fitness calculators (BMI, BMR, calorie tracking)
- Math calculators (percentages, fractions, statistics)
- Unit converters (length, weight, temperature, currency)
- Date & time calculators
- Business calculators (taxes, payroll, expenses)

Calculator Categories:
Financial: mortgage-calculator, loan-calculator, savings-calculator, investment-calculator, credit-card-calculator, budget-calculator
Health: bmi-calculator, bmr-calculator, calorie-calculator, body-fat-calculator, ideal-weight-calculator, water-intake-calculator
Math: percentage-calculator, fraction-calculator, scientific-calculator, average-calculator, standard-deviation-calculator
Converters: unit-conversion-calculator, currency-converter, temperature-converter
Business: tax-calculator, payroll-calculator, expense-calculator
Utilities: age-calculator, date-calculator, tip-calculator, word-counter-calculator

Important Pages:
https://quick-calculator.org/ - Homepage with calculator categories

# Phase 1 Calculators - Most Important
# Financial Calculators
https://quick-calculator.org/mortgage-calculator - Home loan payment calculator
https://quick-calculator.org/loan-calculator - Personal loan calculator

https://quick-calculator.org/investment-calculator - Investment returns calculator
https://quick-calculator.org/budget-calculator - Personal/business budget calculator
https://quick-calculator.org/credit-card-calculator - Credit card payment calculator

# Health & Fitness Calculators
https://quick-calculator.org/bmi-calculator - Body mass index calculator
https://quick-calculator.org/bmr-calculator - Basal metabolic rate calculator
https://quick-calculator.org/calorie-calculator - Daily calorie requirements
https://quick-calculator.org/body-fat-calculator - Body fat percentage calculator
https://quick-calculator.org/ideal-weight-calculator - Healthy weight range calculator

# Math & Everyday Calculators
https://quick-calculator.org/percentage-calculator - Percentage calculations
https://quick-calculator.org/fraction-calculator - Fraction arithmetic
https://quick-calculator.org/average-calculator - Mean, median, mode calculator
https://quick-calculator.org/unit-converter - Unit conversion tools
https://quick-calculator.org/scientific-calculator - Scientific calculator
https://quick-calculator.org/pythagorean-theorem-calculator - Right triangle calculator
https://quick-calculator.org/standard-deviation-calculator - Statistics calculator
https://quick-calculator.org/circle-area-calculator - Circle area calculator
https://quick-calculator.org/age-calculator - Age calculator
https://quick-calculator.org/tip-calculator - Restaurant tip calculator
https://quick-calculator.org/gpa-calculator - Grade point average calculator
https://quick-calculator.org/word-counter - Word and character counter
https://quick-calculator.org/numbers-to-words-converter - Number to text converter
https://quick-calculator.org/date-calculator - Date calculations

Key Features:
- Instant calculations with detailed explanations
- Mobile-responsive design
- No registration required
- Free to use
- Educational content and tips

Use Cases:
# Financial Planning & Home Ownership
- Home buyers calculating mortgage payments and total interest
- Refinancing decisions with loan comparison calculators
- Investment planning and compound interest projections
- Retirement savings goal calculations
- Budget planning for personal and business expenses
- Credit card payoff strategies and interest calculations
- Loan affordability assessments for major purchases
- Tax calculations for individuals and businesses
- Payroll calculations for employers
- Currency exchange for international transactions

- BMI calculations for weight management goals

- Health risk assessments

- Students solving percentage problems

- Average calculations for datasets
- Mathematical research and academic work

- Currency conversion for foreign travel
- Temperature conversions between Celsius/Fahrenheit

- Unit conversions for recipes in different regions
